files_read.purpose: Base agent class with execute pattern and confidence scoring
Crew orchestration skeleton with sequential/parallel/hierarchical stubs
Reference implementation of lead qualifier using BaseAgent pattern
Architecture decision for agent tool-calling with approval middleware
STOA Framework defining Intelligence STOA responsibilities
AI configuration with provider selection and cost tracking

invariants_acknowledged: Type Safety: All LLM inputs/outputs use Zod schemas for validation
Cost Control: Every LLM invocation tracks tokens and costs with configurable limits
Human-in-the-Loop: AI outputs include confidence scores; allow human override when confidence < 0.5
Performance Targets: AI scoring <2s per lead (p95), batch operations with rate limiting
Hexagonal Architecture: Agent domain logic has no infrastructure dependencies
Structured Output: All agent outputs must be parseable and validated against schemas
Audit Trail: All agent executions are logged with full context for replay
